content.prompt: The creation of the temple on the right demonstrates the

choices.label: incorporation of a natural mountain into the architectural design
construction of a major Buddhist monument, far from the capitol
use of modern surveying equipment to achieve precise measurements and alignments
importation of Hinduism from India by royal patrons for political purposes

unit.text: 8: South, East, and Southeast Asia, 300 BCE - 1980 CE

topic.text: 8.2: Purpose and Audience in South, East, and Southeast Asian Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
